name: GetCommentReactions
description:
Retrieve reactions for a specific comment in Figma.

Call this tool to get a list of reactions left on a specified comment within a Figma file. Useful for tracking user engagement or feedback on specific comments.

parameters.name: file_identifier
parameters.description: File or branch key to retrieve comment reactions from. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with `branch_data` query to get the branch key.

value_schema.description: File to get comment containing reactions from. This can be a file key or branch key. Use `GET /v1/files/:key` with the `branch_data` query param to get the branch key.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: ID of the comment to retrieve reactions from within the Figma file.

value_schema.description: ID of comment to get reactions from.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination, retrieved from the response of the previous call.

value_schema.description: Cursor for pagination, retrieved from the response of the previous call.
